Name: African
Description: Individuals with ancestral roots in the African continent. Primarily from South Africaâ€™s native ethnic groups such as Zulu, Xhosa, Sotho, and Tswana.

Name: Coloured
Description: Refers to individuals of mixed ancestry, including Khoisan, African, European, and Asian backgrounds, traditionally found in Western and Northern Cape.

Name: Indian/Asian
Description: Refers to individuals of Indian or Asian descent, whose ancestors primarily arrived in South Africa in the 19th century.

Name: White
Description: Refers to individuals of European descent, predominantly from Afrikaner or English-speaking backgrounds.

Name: Other
Description: Any other ethnic groups, including immigrants from various regions outside of South Africa.

Name: Prefer not to say
Description: Used for individuals who prefer not to disclose their ethnicity.
